turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, hope you're morning is going well. Can you pick up coffee on you way into work today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very well. Yes, where should I pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks 21 14th Street NE Atlanta, GA 30309

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The weather is difficult today, but you like to be brazen, what do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am preferring a warm beverage. Something basic.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want their drip coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but let's add something more.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I could ask them to add a syrup. Or a particular roast, how do you feel about their blonde roast?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Dark roast, please. I want it to be a bit creamy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want a latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, have them add half and half.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want anything to make it sweeter or flavored?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ask them to kindly add a single pump of their mocha sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want because a single pump can go a big or a long way, depending.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a venti. The largest hot beverage cup available.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, using your account I'm ordering a trenta iced coffee, anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it to stay very warm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I ask them to make it hotter than normal, that literally comes with a label.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, please ask them to use two cups, as it insulates it better.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am going to add sugar-free vanilla to my iced coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go for it. The receipt will show up on my account. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you and I will see you soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please make sure to tip. Baristas are our friends.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will tip.
